Trade/Device Name(s): Sol-Guard TM XtraThin Safety Pull-Button Blood Collection Set
Sol-GuardTM XtraThin Safety Pull-Button Blood Collection Set with Pre-attached Holder
Sol-GuardTM XtraThin Safety Pull-Button Blood Collection Set with Luer Adaptor
Sol-Guard TM XtraThin Safety Pull-Button IV Infusion Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sol-Guard TM XtraThin Safety Pull-Button Blood Collection Set, a sterile single-use blood collection and short-term infusion device with spring retractable needle for needlestick prevention.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for venipuncture to obtain blood specimens from patients or short-term (up to 2 hours) infusion, with needle safety feature to aid in needlestick injury prevention; device must not be left in place and requires direct clinician supervision.
